article_title: Oklahoma needs to expand Medicaid, health care administrators urge
article_text:
Enid, OK (73701)

Today

Cloudy this morning. Scattered thunderstorms developing this afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High 83F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray severe thunderstorm is possible. Low 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph.

article_metadata.author: Jeff Mullin | Enid News & Eagle

og.description: By expanding its Medicaid program, Oklahoma would create an estimated 24,000 new jobs, resulting in state and local tax revenues estimated at $620 million between 2016 and 2023. — Local
